 42  Declarations

 44
 45#if !VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 46
 47namespace vsip_csl
 48{
 49namespace dispatcher
 50{
 51template <dimension_type D,
 52          symmetry_type S,
 53          support_region_type R,
 54          typename T,
 55          unsigned int N,
 56          alg_hint_type H>
 57struct List<op::conv<D, S, R, T, N, H> >
 58{
 59  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 60			 be::cml,
 61			 be::intel_ipp,
 62			 be::mercury_sal,
 63			 be::cvsip,
 64			 be::generic>::type type;
 65};
 66} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
 67} // namespace vsip_csl
 68
 69#endif
 70
 71namespace vsip
 72{
 73
 74template <template <typename, typename> class ConstViewT,
 75	  symmetry_type                       Symm,
 76	  support_region_type                 Supp,
 77	  typename                            T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 78	  unsigned                            N_times = 0,
 79          alg_hint_type                       A_hint = alg_time>
 80class Convolution
 81  : public impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal>,
 82#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 83    public impl::cvsip::Convolution<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 84                                    Symm, Supp, float, N_times, A_hint>
 85#else
 86    public vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 87             vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::conv<
 88               impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 89				 Symm,
 90				 Supp,
 91				 T,
 92				 N_times,
 93				 A_hint> >::type
 94#endif
 95{
 96  // Implementation compile-time constants.
 97private: 
 98  static dimension_type const dim = impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim;
 99
100  typedef impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal> accumulator_type;
101
102#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
103  typedef impl::cvsip::Convolution<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
104                                   Symm, Supp, float, N_times, A_hint> base_type;
105#else
106  typedef typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
107    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::conv<dim,
108				   Symm,
109				   Supp,
110				   T,
111				   N_times,
112				   A_hint> >::type base_type;
113#endif
114
115public:
116  template <typename Block>
117  Convolution(ConstViewT<T, Block> filter_coeffs,
118	      Domain<dim> const&   input_size,
119	      length_type          decimation = 1)
120    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
121      : accumulator_type(impl::signal_detail::Description<dim, T>::tag
122                         ("Convolution",
123                          impl::extent(impl::conv_output_size
124                                       (Supp, view_domain(filter_coeffs), 
125                                        input_size, decimation)),
126                          impl::extent(filter_coeffs)),
127                         impl::signal_detail::Op_count_conv<dim, T>::value
128                         (impl::extent(impl::conv_output_size
129                                       (Supp, view_domain(filter_coeffs),
130                                        input_size, decimation)),
131                          impl::extent(filter_coeffs))),
132        base_type(filter_coeffs, input_size, decimation)
133  {
134    assert(decimation >= 1);
135    assert(Symm == nonsym ? (filter_coeffs.size() <=   input_size.size())
136			  : (filter_coeffs.size() <= 2*input_size.size()));
137  }
138
139  Convolution(Convolution const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
140  Convolution& operator=(Convolution const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
141  ~Convolution() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
142
143  // Convolution operators.
144public:
145#if USE_IMPL_VIEWS
146  template <template <typename, typename> class V1,
147	    template <typename, typename> class V2,
148	    typename Block1,
149	    typename Block2>
150  typename impl::View_of_dim<dim, T, Block2>::type
151  operator()(
152    impl_const_View<V1, Block1, T, dim> in,
153    impl_View<V2, Block2, T, dim>       out)
154    VSIP_NOTHROW
155  {
156    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
157
158    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
159      assert(in.size(d) == this->input_size()[d].size());
160
161    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
162      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
163
164    convolve(in.impl_view(), out.impl_view());
165
166    return out;
167  }
168#else
169  template <typename Block1,
170	    typename Block2>
171  Vector<T, Block2>
172  operator()(
173    const_Vector<T, Block1> in,
174    Vector<T, Block2>       out)
175    VSIP_NOTHROW
176  {
177    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
178
179    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
180      assert(in.size(d) == this->input_size()[d].size());
181
182    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
183      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
184
185    convolve(in, out);
186
187    return out;
188  }
189
190  template <typename Block1,
191	    typename Block2>
192  Matrix<T, Block2>
193  operator()(
194    const_Matrix<T, Block1> in,
195    Matrix<T, Block2>       out)
196    VSIP_NOTHROW
197  {
198    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
199
200    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
201      assert(in.size(d) == this->input_size()[d].size());
202
203    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
204      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
205
206    convolve(in, out);
207
208    return out;
209  }
210#endif
211
212  float impl_performance(char const* what) const
213  {
214    if      (!strcmp(what, "mops"))  return this->mops();
215    else if (!strcmp(what, "time"))  return this->total();
216    else if (!strcmp(what, "count")) return this->count();
217    else return this->base_type::impl_performance(what);
218  }
219};
220
221} // namespace vsip
222
223#endif // VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CONV_HPP
